about_the_game:
Shadow Mansion: Step Into the Shadows

🌌 From the creators of the upcoming "PARALLEL PLAGUE: Good Old Days," Shadow Mansion offers a harrowing glimpse into a world where fear and mystery intertwine.

An Atmosphere Like No Other

Welcome to Shadow Mansion, where every shadow hides a secret, and every sound sends shivers down your spine. This chilling horror adventure unfolds within the decaying walls of an abandoned estate, steeped in dark history and sinister secrets.

With hyper-realistic visuals and meticulously crafted soundscapes, the mansion becomes a living entity—watching, waiting, and challenging your every move.

A Story That Grips Your Soul

A cryptic invitation leads you to the gates of an ancient mansion shrouded in mystery. Once inside, the horrors of the past refuse to remain buried. Discover the curse that binds your family to a demonic pact and navigate a labyrinth of terror where unseen forces prey on your deepest fears.

But beware—you're not alone. The shadows watch, and the mansion remembers.

Key Features

🕯️ Immersive Horror Atmosphere: A meticulously detailed environment where darkness feels alive, and silence becomes deafening.
🔍 Engaging Storyline: Unravel a narrative packed with twists, complex characters, and chilling revelations that will keep you guessing till the very end.
🧩 Mind-Bending Puzzles: Gather cryptic clues, solve challenging puzzles, and unlock the mansion's most guarded secrets.
🪓 Survival at Every Turn: Conserve resources, stay vigilant, and avoid the lurking threats that haunt every corner of the mansion.
🌀 Psychological Thriller Elements: Experience escalating tension and moments of sheer dread designed to unsettle and surprise.

Gameplay That Keeps You on Edge

Step into the role of an unwitting guest drawn into the mansion's macabre tale. Navigate its winding corridors and hidden rooms through a first-person perspective. Your courage, wits, and resourcefulness will be tested as you delve deeper into the mansion’s haunted past.

🔦 Conquer Your Fear: Face what hides in the shadows or risk succumbing to the mansion’s curse.
🗝️ Unravel the Mystery: Piece together the tragic history of Shadow Mansion and confront the unspeakable evil at its core.

Dare to Explore

Shadow Mansion isn’t just a game—it’s an experience. A chilling odyssey where every decision matters, every noise unsettles, and the line between reality and nightmare blurs.

The mansion is waiting. Will you step inside?

🎮 Coming Soon: Immerse yourself in Shadow Mansion and prepare for the scare of a lifetime.
detailed_description:
Dear Players,

Today, we present to you not just a game but also a story to share, a world to explore, and a journey to embark on together. Shadow Mansion is more than just a game; it is a gateway to deep stories, unique experiences, and true entertainment in the gaming world.

We know that today, many games, despite their massive budgets, lack passion, creativity, and a genuine connection with players. That’s why we have chosen a different path: prioritizing fun and passion while building a game universe that evolves and grows with your invaluable feedback.

We are not alone on this journey; with your support, Shadow Mansion is only the beginning. Every update, every new content, and every expansion pack will be shaped by your ideas and suggestions. Because this is not just our story, but also a legend we are writing together with you.

We promise:

  • We will always stand behind our games.

  • We will carefully listen to your feedback and shape this journey together.

  • We will continue to walk in the light of fun, innovation, and games created with passion.

Today, we are moving forward as a team that not only offers products to players but also builds on their love and trust. With your support, we wholeheartedly believe that we will bring immense stories and epic games to life in the future.

Thank you for being with us on this adventure. We look forward to redefining the gaming world with you.

Nebula Nova Games Team

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-4340 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 670 / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1650 or AMD Radeon™ HD 7950
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2500K or AMD Ryzen™ R5 1600X Processor
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 970 / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1660 or AMD Radeon™ R9 390 / AMD Radeon™ RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Shadow Mansion: A Sweet Dose of Fear Get ready for a short yet impactful horror experience! Shadow Mansion offers a cozy horror adventure that you can finish in one night, delivering remarkable quality for its price. The shadow-filled mansion awaits—do you dare to step inside?
